cause.description:
The NEPA Rainbow Alliance is a coalition of LGBT individuals, families, groups, and Supportive Allies who support programs and services serving the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Community in Northeastern Pennsylvania.
Join the GayNEPA list at http://lists.gaynepa.com.
1. LGBT community development is important in NEPA.
2. Coordination of PrideFest - Aug. 9, 2009
cause.mission: Provide programs and services serving the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender Community in Northeastern Pennsylvania
cause.name: GayNEPA.com: Support the LGBT Community in NEPA -- Allies Welcome!
